nodes.text: Aargau: For All Your Banking Needs, Part 2: Secure Lines of Credit

Aargau: For All Your Banking Needs, Part 2: Secure Lines of Credit is the second entry in the Planet Hoppers Aargau: For All Your Banking Needs article series, written by Cory J. Herndon and released on Wizards.com on August 14, 2003. The story discusses the banking planet Aargau.
